Original message in bits:
010001110100111101001111010001110100110001000101001000000101011101001111010101110010000001000011010011110100111101001100

Key:
100100010001100111111001001100111101111111111011110011110111111101100001111001111001110100010000110001110000001100111010

After combining together we get these bits:
110101100101011010110110011101001001001110111110111011110010100000101110101100001011110101010011100010000100110001110110
